articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Hwanghae Province
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a field survey of rice-transplanting in Jaeryong, Anak, Unchon and Unryul counties, South Hwanghae Province.
					 The premier visited different co-operative farms, encouraging officials and agricultural workers in accelerating the rice-transplantation.
					
					 Underscoring the need to decisively settle water shortage in order to overcome a long spell of drought, he called on the co-op farms to draw water to auxiliary small reservoirs including water hole, well, tube-well and underground reservoir and widely apply scientific farming methods including a water-saving style farming method.
					
					 He took measures to supply sufficient electricity for pumping water.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye of S. Korea Accused of Her Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye of S. Korea Accused of Her Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A string of malignant invectives let loose by Park Geun Hye of south Korea is lashing all Koreans into great fury.
					 She is making a flurry of reckless remarks to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north while making hectic trips to various countries, not content with her rigmaroles at home. This reminds people of a viper.
					
					 Shortly ago, she let loose a spate of remarks like a sleep walker that the DPRK "would collapse soon due to instability of its social system." She blustered that "human rights issue in north Korea" should never be overlooked, jabbering that "it is impossible to implement the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts" and "it is only bringing on itself the isolation from the international community."
					
					 Much upset by the DPRK's successful and legitimate underwater test-fire of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine, the news of which world public heard with astonishment and envy, she drove the puppet military forces into escalating military confrontation, crying out for "prompt counteraction and resolute punishment to cope with provocations and threat."  This behavior is reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 She is going so foolish as to egg the UN on to take a new step for pressurizing the DPRK.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Body of Working People's Organizations made public a statement on Sunday.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The history of division of the Korean nation knows many villains who were ill-famed for confrontation with compatriots but there has been no such wicked woman as Park Geun Hye who has gone busy slandering the fellow countrymen in the north and inciting confrontation with them round the clock and all the year round.
					
					 She is getting ever more undisguised in hurling mud at the compatriots, no more than a last-ditch effort to get rid of her worst ruling crisis.
					
					 She is living hand to mouth like a candle flickering in the wind as the fraudulent methods she employed during "the presidential" election are being disclosed one after another.
					
					 The Song Wan Jong case in which a group of her "confidants" were involved clearly proves who is the kingpin of scandals and mastermind of social evils.
					
					 She had better zip her lips, though belatedly.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than calculating that such reckless tongue-lashing would serve as a stopgap for weathering any crisis.
					
					 She would be well advised to bear in mind that such venomous tongue-wagging would only precipitate her tragic end.
					
					 South Korea can never get rid of the present bottomless political quandary as long as Park remains in office.

articles.title: Moldovan President Hopes for Better Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Moldovan President Hopes for Better Ties with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Kim Hyong Jun presented his credentials to Nikolai Timofti, president of the Republic of Moldova, on May 13.
					 The president said that he and the Moldovan people are recollecting the emotion-charged day when President Kim Il Sung, world political elder, dropped in at border city Ungheni of Moldova on his tour of the East European socialist countries in 1984.
					
					 He expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields including politics, economy and culture on the basis of the good tradition provided during the period.
					
					 He reiterated his sincere wish for the friendly Korean people that they would make bigger success in the efforts for the country's socio-economic development under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Another Historical Relics Unearthed in DPRK
articles.content:
Another Historical Relics Unearthed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Another historical relics were discovered at Manwoltae, the site of royal palace of the Koryo Kingdom (918-1392), which is located in the area of Kaesong City, the DPRK.
					 It was confirmed that one of the relics belonged to a building where memorial services were held for the first five kings of Koryo Kingdom.
					
					 Stylobates, cornerstones, decorative stones, Koryo celadons and other remains found there give a glimpse of highly exquisite stonework and ceramic art in the period of Koryo Kingdom.

articles.title: New Building Materials Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Building Materials Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Home-made building materials were displayed at the 15th May 21 Architectural Festival in the DPRK.
					 They include slag cement, threefold block for decoration and heat insulation and hardening accelerator presented by the Architectural Engineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The Pyongyang University of Architecture presented outdoor paint made of potash water glass and a large-sized shuttering made of magnesia cement while the Pyongyang Building-materials Factory manufactured a mobile glaze stirrer.

articles.title: Hamhung Orphans' Secondary School
articles.content:
Hamhung Orphans' Secondary School
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Hamhung Orphans' Secondary School is attracting attention of the citizens after having finished third in the provincial tournament of football classes from junior secondary schools, which was held in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					 In this regard, Mun Pyong Su, rector of the school, told KCNA that it was the first time for his school to attend the tournament.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, a sports teacher of the school, said:
					
					 All of the citizens are extending heartfelt congratulations to the school on its success in the tournament.
					
					 The success is attributable to the benevolent loving care shown by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to the orphans.
					
					 The school has paid big efforts to sports activities among the orphans.
					
					 Many aid bodies in the city provided them with uniforms and various kinds of sports apparatuses.
					
					 People say my team is physically well prepared, calling it a promising team.

articles.title: New Health Foodstuff Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Health Foodstuff Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A new kind of health foodstuff was developed by the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University. 
					 The foodstuff, listed as one of 10 top inventions in the DPRK in 2014, is made of substances extracted from flax, bean and other edible herbs.
					
					 Confirmed to be efficacious for mastopathy, it is good for women's health, giving no adverse effect on human body.
					
					 The Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital has applied it to patients with mastopathy.
					
					 The foodstuff was in good demand in the 18th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Children's Foodstuff and School Things
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Children's Foodstuff and School Things
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of children's foodstuff and school things took place in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 More than 3 050 items were displayed at the exhibition.
					
					 According to an official of the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries, the exhibition marked a good occasion in improving the quality of foodstuff and school things.
					
					 What caught visitors' attention were children's foodstuffs presented by the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory and Paeksong and Songdowon general foodstuff factories and school things produced by the Pyongyang School Things Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, a foodstuff exhibition was separately held.
					
					 Products of Susongchon, Songdowon and Jongbangsan general foodstuff factories drew attention of visitors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in Heyday of Literature and Art
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in Heyday of Literature and Art
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon the officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art to usher in a fresh heyday of literature and art at an early date while overcoming stagnation in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu. 
					 Recalling that all the service personnel and people are dashing ahead like the wind to significantly greet the grand festival in October, the editorial says now is the time for the field of literature and art to brace up once again and bring about a radical turn in literature and art in the new century as early as possible in the spirit of the 9th national conference of artistes. 
					
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 All the officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art should overcome stagnation in the spirit of blizzards of Paektu and create lots of masterpieces in order to fulfill their duties as writers and artistes of Juche in the on-going drive for the final victory.
					
					 The drive to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, carry out the party's idea and defend the party's policies in the field of literature and art at present is like a do-or-die drive to carry out the tasks set forth in a letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the participants in the 9th national conference of artistes. 
					
					 The officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art should implement to the letter the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his letter the way the service personnel unconditionally implement the tasks given by the Supreme Commander in the shortest time and on the best level under any unfavorable conditions and in the transparent creative spirit displayed by the Moranbong Band. 
					
					 It is possible to create a large number of masterpieces when all the units, creators and artistes dynamically wage a hot emulation for creating excellent works by dropping the conception that masterpieces of the times can be produced only by a few famous organizations like the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus, the editorial stresses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Living and Struggling in Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Living and Struggling in Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea calls upon all the officials, party members and other people to live and struggle in the spirit of defending the country in the 1950s, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This call reflects the noble intention to steadily carry forward the spirit of heroic struggle fully displayed in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War, achieve a new victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation in order to eternally glorify the feats and tradition of the great victory in the war.  
					
					 The spirit of defending the country displayed by the defenders in the 1950s who brought July 27, the day of victory in the war, serves as the ideological and moral legacy incomparable with any amount of wealth and the biggest treasure to be handed down to posterity.
					
					 The spirit of devotedly carrying out the orders and instructions of President Kim Il Sung with the firm faith that victory was always in store for them when they were led by the President is the core of the spirit of defending the country displayed in the 1950s.
					
					 This spirit serves as an ideological and moral weapon to glorify the tradition of the victory generation after generation.
					
					 All the officials, party members and other people should firmly equip themselves with the above-said spirit and achieve shining victory in the drive for building a thriving nation and in the confrontation with the U.S. and thus make July 27 victory in the war the eternal day of victory.

articles.title: DPRK Always Confident of Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Always Confident of Victory: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK recently made a successful underwater test-fire of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine of Korean style.
					 Through the full acquisition of the technology of underwater launch of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine the Korean revolutionary armed forces had access to a strategic weapon of the world's level capable of striking and wiping out hostile forces in any waters and came to conduct any underwater operation, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					
					 This makes the U.S. tremble like an aspen leaf, feeling uneasy, though it has gone reckless in nuclear war drills by introducing nuclear carriers and other combat warships into the waters off south Korea and the Pacific, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This spectacular success made by the DPRK in the underwater test-fire of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine, a product of its Songun line and line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, is increasing the uneasiness of the U.S. and causing greater mental stress to the Obama administration.
					
					 There is a question as to what does the time wasted so far by Obama since he took office show.
					
					 It proves that the DPRK is emerging victorious while the U.S. is meeting a setback.
					
					 It will be proven by the world-startling military and economic achievements to be made in the DPRK in the future.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Resistance for Achieving Independence, Democracy and Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Resistance for Achieving Independence, Democracy and Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju Popular Uprising in 1980 was a bloody anti-U.S., anti-fascist patriotic struggle staged by the south Korean people to put an end to the U.S. colonial rule, ferocious fascist military dictatorial rule of the Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Tae Woo cliques, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article. 
					 The uprising dealt a telling blow at the protracted military fascist dictatorship, shook the U.S. colonial rule to its very foundation and made a strong storm of movement for independence, democracy and reunification sweep across south Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is an urgent task required by the times to wage a dynamic patriotic struggle for achieving independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea by carrying forward the spirit of the uprisers.
					
					 It is 35 years since the uprising but the desire of the brave participants in the resistance to see an independent and democratic new society and achieve the reunification of the country has not yet come true.
					
					 The dignity and sovereignty, democracy and human rights of the south Korean people are still mercilessly infringed upon by outsiders and traitors.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the south Korean people can neither enjoy their freedom and democracy nor defend their right to existence as long as the aggressors and traitors kowtowing to them are allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 The resistance of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification has not yet come to an end.
					
					 The south Korean people should get united as one in the struggle by carrying forward the spirit of the Kwangju uprisers who staged heroic death-defying actions, unyielding to injustice and dictatorship, and thus put an end to the fascist dictatorial rule of the U.S. and its lackeys and build a new democratic society without fail.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Denounces IS for Its Politically-motivated Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Denounces IS for Its Politically-motivated Suppression
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's (IS) Fabrication of Attempted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on May 14 to condemn the puppet group for its politically-motivated suppression in a bid to tide over the crisis.
					 Speakers referred to the fact that the IS instigated the prosecution to throw behind bars three personages including a spokesman for the former Unified Progressive Party on charges of sympathizing with the lecture given by Ri Sok Gi, former lawmaker from the party.
					
					 They stressed that such action was taken against them on the charges cooked up by the Park Geun Hye regime in a bid to get rid of the tight corner in which it is finding itself due to the suspicions about the illegal fund spent for "the presidential" election and operation of election office.
					
					 Terming it politically-motivated suppression, they demanded the release of all detainees.

articles.title: Joint Actions for Workers' Right to Existence Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Actions for Workers' Right to Existence Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Trade Unions of the Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd. and the subcontract branch of Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd. under the Ulsan chapter of the Metal Workers Trade Unions of south Korea held a joint rally for workers' right to existence outside the office of the trade union of the company on May 14, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 The rally was attended by more than 3,000 workers.
					
					 Speakers deplored that subcontracted workers have to read others' face even though they got hurt while working, far from demanding wage-hike and nobody takes responsibility even though they meet death.
					
					 Calling for pooling efforts of workers against suppression by the company side, they appealed to the workers subject to exploitation to rise in actions.
					
					 They called for winning the right to existence through the joint actions of subcontracted workers.

articles.title: Arirang, Typical Folk Song of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Arirang, Typical Folk Song of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A lecture titled "World intangible cultural heritage-Arirang" and a film show took place at a Guinean company on May 11.
					 An official of the company in a lecture explained how the song "Arirang" came into being. He added the Koreans have widely sung "Arirang", a typical folk song of the nation registered as a world intangible cultural heritage.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 We can hear "Arirang" sung not only on the Korean peninsula but everywhere the Koreans reside.
					
					 Grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" was produced as a world masterpiece in April 2002 and has since been given before full houses finally to be registered in the Guinness Book of World Records in August 2007.
					
					 The Korean nation is also called the "Arirang nation".
					
					 "Arirang" helps the world come to know better about the Korean nation as a homogeneous nation with one and same language and culture.
					
					 The lecture was followed by the Korean film "Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'".

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua estado de faena agricola de provincia de Hwanghae de Sur
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua estado de faena agricola de provincia de Hwanghae de Sur
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el estado de transplante de arroz de los distritos de Jaeryong, An-ak, Unchon y Unryul de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Recorriendo varias granjas cooperativas, Pak estimulo a los funcionarios y los campesinos quienes apresuran la trasplantacion.
					
					Hay que solucionar decisivamente el problema de agua dado que sigue la pesima sequia, dijo y prosiguio que los campos cooperativos deben contener mucha agua en charcos, pozos, tubo elevador de agua y otras fuentes auxiliares y aplicar activamente cientificos metodos de cultivo tales como el  cultivo con pocas aguas.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas practicas para asegurar con suficiencia la energia de bombeo.

articles.title: Portavoz de CNOM critica disparates de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de CNOM critica disparates de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) --El portavoz del Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas publico el dia 17 una declaracion como sigue:
					En estos dias, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye suele pronunciar los disparates conflictivos en el interior y exterior del pais. Picoteo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "se derribaria pronto" debido a la "inestabilidad del regimen". Disparateo como sonambulo que no es permisible mas el "problema de derechos humanos del Norte" diciendo que "es irrealizable la linea de desarrollo paralelo" y la RPDC "opta el camino de aislamiento" de la sociedad internacional.
					
					 Ademas, atemorizada de la noticia del exito en el lanzamiento justo del proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico al estilo coreano, suelta palabras tales como "provocacion" y "creacion de amenaza" y ordena a los belicistas de la capa militar titere que tomen la "reaccion inmediata" y den "castigo rotundo".
					
					 Para colmo, trama complot para que la ONU tome nueva medida de presion a la RPDC.
					
					En la historia de division de la nacion coreana habia los malditos de mala fama por la confrontacion fratricida, pero Park Geun-hye se entrega mas perversamente a menoscabar a la connacional RPDC e inculcar el enfrentamiento fratricida desde los primeros dias de su mandato hasta la fecha. 
					
					En estos momentos llegan al climax las maldiciones de la mandataria Park Geun-hye a fin de liberarse de la peor crisis de dominacion. 
					
					Ahora Park Geun-hye vive en agonia como una vela batida por el viento, porque se revela sucesivamente el hecho de que ella tomo el poder con los fraudes ilicitos. 
					
					Y en este crimen estan involucrados por un hilo los "vasallos meritorios especiales" de Park. 
					
					Esto evidencia quien es el caudillo de los casos de irregularidades y corrupcion y origen de los malos sociales. 
					
					Aunque sea ahora, Park debe cerrar la boca a lo minimo.
					
					Es una absurdidad si ella piensa en que sus maldiciones abominables serian un remedio para salvar la crisis. 
					
					Debe tener presente que su chismorreo traera con antelacion el resultado tragico. 
					
					Mientras Park Geun-hye, malcarada y virulenta que no se cuida la lengua, este como duena de Chongwadae, la politica del Sur de Corea no se liberara del abismo de corrupcion.

articles.title: Desenterradas ruinas y reliquias de periodo de Coryo
articles.content:
Desenterradas ruinas y reliquias de periodo de Coryo
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente fueron desenterradas varias ruinas en Manwoldae, solar del palacio real del periodo de Coryo (918-1392) situado en Kaesong, ciudad historico-cultural de Corea.
					 Las 3 ruinas del palacio forman parte de un area de edificios individuales y especialmente se aclaro que el solar del primer palacio es el de edificio donde habian celebrado la ceremonia en recordacion de 5 difuntos reyes de Coryo anotados en la "Historia de Coryo".
					
					 Ademas fueron descubiertos los granitos bien elaborados, las piedras de cimiento, las de adorno, varios accesorios y muchas reliquias usadas en la construccion del palacio.
					
					 Tales ruinas y reliquias contribuyen a comprender el nivel de la cultura y tecnica incluyendo el desarrollado metodo de obra y labrado de piedras y el arte de la ceramica de aquel tiempo.

articles.title: El tiempo esta al lado de la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
El tiempo esta al lado de la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realizo con exito la prueba de lanzamiento del proyectil balistico del submarino estrategico, lo cual posibilita a las fuerzas armadas  revolucionarias de  la RPDC desarrollar a sus ganas las operaciones acuaticas con armas estrategicas de talla mundial capaces de aniquilar a las fuerzas hostiles en cualquier zona maritima. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Esto tiembla a EE.UU. que se entrega a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear introduciendo el colectivo de portaaviones nuclear y otros buques de combate en las aguas meridionales de la Peninsula Coreana y el Oceano Pacifico considerandolos como mares de su propio pais. 
					
					El exito en la prueba del proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico aumenta la inquietud del imperio norteamericano y da gran presion mental al poder de Obama. 
					
					?Que muestra el tiempo transcurrido despues de la aparicion el poder de Obama?
					
					La RPDC sale victoriosa y EE.UU. sufre fracaso. 
					
					El tiempo no esta al lado de EE.UU., sino a favor de la RPDC. 
					
					Lo comprobaran los exitos militares y economicos de la RPDC que se crearan en adelante admirando al mundo.
